title: Scientific Writing Workshop for Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Principles and Experience in Writing Simple Reports
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based collaborative tools, supplemented by offline discussion sessions.

learning_goals: Students can utilize three or more writing formats (observation journals, reflective essays, process maps) during design problem-solving
Learners can integrate two or more creative writing elements into a design sketchbook explaining scientific concepts
Participants can revise and improve writing outputs two or more times based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
